page.title: 03The Town Centre
page.content: Thousands of people shop in the town centres traffic free areas and the main High Street.There is the complaint that there is not a wide enough range of shops and most of the shopppers want central{Mell Square}to be closed to traffic all week and not just Saturdays. The council are applying for planning permission to extend the precinct into{George}and{ {New Roads}but people living in houses there are objecting a great deal.Solihull is a successful area for trade as unemployment is low and there is plenty of money to be spent. The council have been building new and modern public buildings in recent years.These include a police station,library and magistrates court.There are more new buildings planned.
